description: Application to clear condition 3 (Fire Safety Strategy) of approved application DM2025/00371.
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall not be occupied prior to the submission and approval of a Fire Safety Strategy pursuant to Policy 12 (A) of the London Plan.Reason: To ensure that the development incorporates the necessary fire safety measures in accordance with the Mayor's London Plan Policy D12.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: ART4 Article 4 Direction - Boroughwide HMO Restriction
